snippet: FIFA’s secretary general, Jérôme Valcke, again raised concerns over Brazil’s World Cup preparations, saying that the stadium for the opening game in São Paulo is among those that worry him most.
lead_paragraph: FIFA’s secretary general, Jérôme Valcke, again raised concerns over Brazil’s World Cup preparations, saying that the stadium for the opening game in São Paulo is among those that worry him most.

headline.main: FIFA Executive Says Brazil Is ‘Not Ready’ for World Cup
headline.print_headline: Executive Says Brazil Is ‘Not Ready’ for World Cup
